summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to floating homes, amending Sections 1, 2, 4, 6, 7, and repealing Sections 5, 8, 9, and 11 of Ordinance 107012 to establish a procedure for review and regulation of moorage fee increases and of terms, convenants and conditions imposed by moorage owners, and providing for transition of pending cases and reconsideration of certain prior cases decided under Ordinance 107012.
